#   URL 

######  https://www.google.com/search?q=javascript&sca_esv=575468271&ei=m_4zZbmKFauy4-EPrPuQ8A8&ved=0ahUKEwj5w_f9yYeCAxUr2TgGHaw9BP4Q4dUDCBA&uact=5&oq=javascript&gs_&sclient=gws-wiz-serp




## HTTP Methods
* get => When you want to get some data form the Server
* post => When you want to send and mutate some data in Server
* put => When you want to add some data into db or server or you wanna upload your profile pic
* patch => when  you want to make modification into existing data
* deletes => when you want to delete some data form Server

so when we create routes we can define its method and make caese so that it can work properly
